reviews.review: This is the best game of all time, better than resident evil franchise, the gman solos.
I mean, do I really need to say anything about this game that hasn't been said already?
A classic game that everyone with a PC needs to play
This game is great! Even if you watch a video, it is worth it to buy it anyways! I can't describe how fun it is. There are some parts that are hard to get by, but you will make it!

I never played Half Life 2 when it first came out, so some of the innovative stuff that this game did didn't really wow since I'm playing it through the lens of shooters that came out after it. Yet as a shooter it's a great time. The variety of weapons and enemies keep you engaged and some levels really stand out compared to others. Half-life 2 still has some frustrating moments but most of that is just due to the game's age.

Wake up Morgan Freeman. Wake up and smell the ashes.
For real, a really good game. Would recommend.

The game is good, good fighting and story. Along with character building, And also a great squad system. I have one complaint the final fight is so hard and you need to do in a minute which is extremely hard.

I think this games story is one of the video game storys I've seen in a video game. The controls are very nice too. The only problem I had with this game is that it left on a cliffhanger. We need half-life 3!

I decided to get this and replay it, and it still feels really unique. Id say that the main draw of the half life games is the story, and its backed up with fast, freeform combat paired with a neat soundtrack.

Honestly such a great campaign that makes you wanna keep playing
I can say without a doubt that this is one of my favourite games. Not only is gameplay mechanics extraordinary, but it captures the essence of why I love playing video games. Highly recommended!
fucking hell that was a good game, play it now.

Good game, but Valve release Half life 3!
Down Right one of the best games ever made.

i finally chose to finish the game today after a year and a half of first playing (i quit like 3/4 in). i have watched speedruns and reviews of the game so i already knew it inside out but i was still engaged like it was a blind playthrough. it is a great game. im gonna play episode one and two now and maybe alyx when im not broke.

update on episode one and two (finished both in one day cause im a fucking loser): one is short and doesn't give you as much as two does but if you have the money/buy the orange box like i did, its definitely worth giving it a try. 

pro tip: don't do the rocket gnome achievement in episode two in your first playthrough. i did and it ruined the game for me. i also did the one where you squish the antlion larvae and that took probably an extra hour in total. didn't even get either one

very simple and vintage but great

If you need to convince someone that videogames are indeed an art form, show them this game.

Half-Life 2 is one of my favorites games. You should totally buy it. It has a very good and interesting story with very cool characters. But you should first play the original Half-Life or Black Mesa because they are really good games too and it's the first game in the franchise.
